description:
syscall/Await: '' from await() indicates correct completion, set Waitmsg.Msg to ""

Plan 9's await() returns '' for nil exit status but programs, most notably gotest,
see this as an error return.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=07548da11316 ***

syscall: fix Await msg on Plan 9

Plan 9's await() returns '' for nil exit status but programs, most notably gotest,
see this as an error return.

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5305079

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
